alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued September 28 at 3:50PM MST until September 28 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 445 PM MST. * At 350 PM MST, a dust channel was over Sun Lakes, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Less than one half mile visibility. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 163 and 182. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 148 and 166. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 43 and 52. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Gilbert, Sun Lakes, Bapchule, Tumbleweed Park, Olberg, Chandler City Hall, Seville, Firebird Lake, Sacaton and Santan. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
